thread.title: Titusville High's Sam Bitner voted Athlete of the Week
thread.title_full: Titusville High's Sam Bitner voted Athlete of the Week

title: Titusville High's Sam Bitner voted Athlete of the Week
text:
Titusville High's Sam Bitner voted Athlete of the Week FLORIDA TODAY 1:03 p.m. EDT October 8, 2015 Buy Photo Titusville High's Sam Bitner (9) is FLORIDA TODAY's Athlete of the Week for the Week of Sept. 28-Oct. 4. (Photo: CRAIG RUBADOUX/FLORIDA TODAY) Buy Photo 16 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Congratulations to Titusville High volleyball player Sam Bitner , FLORIDA TODAYâ€™s high school Athlete of the Week for the week of Sept. 28-Oct. 4. 
In two matches last week, Bitner had a combined 40 kills. She had 22 kills and three blocks in a win over Cocoa on Tuesday, and she added 18 kills in a win over Cocoa Beach on Thursday. 
Bitner won in the closest vote yet, defeating Merritt Island cross country runner Steven Cross by 6 votes. Bitner collected 32 percent of more than 500 votes cast. Cross had 31 percent. 
Third place was taken by Heritage High football player Josh Gaines (21 percent), followed by Edgewood High bowler Eduard Meighan (13 percent) and Viera High golfer Sophie Liu (3 percent). 
Be sure to vote this upcoming Monday for the next Athlete of the Week. 
FLORIDA TODAY's Athlete of the Week sponsored by Community Credit Union (Photo: Athlete of the Week sponsored by Community Credit Union) Read or Share this story: http://on.flatoday.com/1Lk7K8K TOP VIDEOS
